alert.note: Alert for Cross; Lee; Poinsett; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 3:16PM CDT until June 07 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lee County in eastern Arkansas... St. Francis County in eastern Arkansas... Southwestern Poinsett County in eastern Arkansas... Cross County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 316 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tupelo to Fair Oaks to near Hunter to near Wheatley, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Forrest City, Wynne, Marianna, Harrisburg, Parkin, Madison, Palestine, Village Creek State Park, Cherry Valley, Caldwell, Colt, Wheatley, Widener, Hickory Ridge, Moro, Haynes, Waldenburg, Garret Grove, Fair Oaks and Vanndale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
